plot: Edgardo Cozarinsky journeys in the footsteps of his father's family, to retrace the existence of a Jewish community founded in the late 19th century in the Entre Ríos.
title: Carta a un padre
plot_es: Edgardo Cozarinsky journeys in the footsteps of his father's family, to retrace the existence of a Jewish community founded in the late 19th century in the Entre Ríos.
plot_en: Edgardo Cozarinsky journeys in the footsteps of his father's family, to retrace the existence of a Jewish community founded in the late 19th century in the Entre Ríos.
